message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer gives me a slight edge, but you still get a decent amount.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. My offer is more than fair considering the inflation.
Bob, my offer still stands.  Let's not drag this out. Time is literally money for you.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer before inflation eats away at my share any further!
Bob, it's time to get serious. This is my final offer. You're losing money with every passing round.
